dcterms:creator: J. Zhang
B. Hao
B. Chen
C. Li
H. Chen
J. Sun
dcterms:description: This educational dataset records the enrollment courses of users ranging from October 1st, 2016 to March 31st, 2018. The dataset shows a typical recommendation pattern in a start-up platform, where the number of users is tens or hundreds of the available items.
dcterms:title: MOOC

dcterms:creator: J. Ni
J. Li
J. McAuley
dcterms:description: This dataset records the rating value of a user-item pair in the Amazon Video Games category. It is a subset of the newly released Amazon review dataset in 2018, which has much larger interactions and graph sizes.
dcterms:title: Amazon Video Games

dcterms:creator: J. Ni
J. Li
J. McAuley
dcterms:description: This dataset is similar to the Amazon Video Games dataset but in the genre of food. It has a much larger interaction graph compared to the Games dataset.
dcterms:title: Amazon Grocery and Gourmet Food

dcterms:creator: Y. Ji
A. Sun
J. Zhang
C. Li
dcterms:description: This is a popularly used check-in dataset for business recommendation. The dataset includes time information and is the latest version downloaded directly from Yelp.com.
dcterms:title: Yelp
